replies.bodyText:
This is not handled in the code, as the code is the same as in upstream. It was not handled in upstream either. I do not know whether rust takes care of it or not, rust is too hard for me to read.
I assume you could take a full copy of the arrays as they are before uploading them, and if the sync fails, restore the copy. However, maybe the upload suceeded and we just never received the confirmation, so the arrays are correct and reverting to previous version would actually be the bug.
I've no clue whether it ever was a problem for anyone (statistically, I assume it has been), but I've no reason to believe that it was actually an important problem
